plot: After Porky and Gabby oversleep yet again, their boss warns them that they'll be fired if they're late again. Determined to make it to work on time the next day, the two roommates go to bed...
title: Porky's Badtime Story
plot_es: After Porky and Gabby oversleep yet again, their boss warns them that they'll be fired if they're late again. Determined to make it to work on time the next day, the two roommates go to bed...
plot_en: After Porky and Gabby oversleep yet again, their boss warns them that they'll be fired if they're late again. Determined to make it to work on time the next day, the two roommates go to bed...
